author: Julia Cleveland

text:
@beowolfradiaoul People like you make life difficult for me, because you've turned knowledge into a feast for your petty ego.

Our ideas are ageless; limitless; shapeless; indestructible. The thing is, your ideas are neither, for your ideas are naught. You are a magician of our world that fools people with your manipulative illusions.

I am the true master of reality's game of chess. You are nothing but a magician who is in denial of their own trickery.

Stop distorting life.
author: Schmidt Herman

text:
@beowolfradiaoul Apparently, we are all [equal]. As you can see, all of us are providing each other naught. You are too ignorant to provide less ignorance, and only feed off of other ignorant people, while you call me ignorant through your own ignorance to deny what is irrefutably present.

Do not try to provoke me with your empty words, because your provocations do not cease my wisdom. What you see as [naught] is only because your entire ability to reason is [naught].
author: Schmidt Herman

text:
@beowolfradiaoul Insecure? Ahh, that is why you are responding as if I had nothing to refute with, while you hide behind your ego, right? You might as well realise that your refutation is no more than what you perceive of my refuation -- naught. You should highly consider where to speak your mind, because you are only making all of look bad by choosing to fight with a blatantly ignorant individual who will only provide you with nothing.

You are right..
author: Schmidt Herman

text:
@beowolfradiaoul You know, you are quite the kind that only makes life difficult for me, because you cannot use your intuition for better means. You sit here using your somewhat better expertise in regards to colloquial fields, but you only use it with an inflated ego. You should be ashamed of yourself for turning knowledge into a poisonous game of pointless dispute.

There will always be ignorance. You are only playing tug o' war with a blackhole that will never hear you.
author: Schmidt Herman

text: I LOVE the soundtracks! I know Chaos Legion was the "guinea pig" game for the studio guys to actually get familiar first and then up came with Onimusha with all their actors' faces gimmick and all that. But I prefer Chaos Legion and I know Onimusha's quality etc. is better but Chaos Legion was just pure cool noir awesome with lack of development by the team. It's like Prototype in a way. Very interesting concept & you feel cool; but just not quite there yet. So if 2's coming out, I'm BUYIN' IT!

text: I love the music, it's so reminiscent of DMC. Kind of sad that they didn't (or haven't yet) made a sequel to this game; the least Capcom could have done if this wasn't an option, was take the mechanics and applied it to Nero in DMC4. Sieg was awesome but just using the one weapon got abit annoying, but after awhile you get use to it in my opinion of course.
